1: At that time you will say, “I will praise you, O Yahweh. Although you had been angry with me, you turned your anger away from me, and you comforted me.
2: Look! El is my Savior. I am confident and unafraid, because Yah is my strength and my song. He is my Savior.”
3: With joy you will draw water from the springs of salvation.
4: At that time you will say, “Praise Yahweh. Call on his name. Make his deeds known among the nations. Make them remember that his name is highly honored.
5: Make music to praise Yahweh. He has done wonderful things. Let this be known throughout the earth.
6: Shout loudly, and sing with joy, people of Zion! Qedosh Yisrael is great. He is among you.”
